snippet.title: Linda Cube Again Kanzenban Sega Saturn Opening HQ
snippet.description:
The opening of cult classic Linda Cube Again for Sega Saturn, including the attract video and some of the menu select screen. In this Japan-only game you're a guy named Ken and it's your job, along with your slightly unstable tomboy girlfriend Linda, to capture a bunch of the animals on the planet of Neo Kenya and put them in an Astro Ark and launch them into space before a meteor destroys the planet in about 8 years. In other words, just your average JRPG.

Captured from a model 1 Sega Saturn using HD Retrovision cables and Elgato HD S with OSSC.
